comments:
I've tried several metamodels available from page http://www.eclipse.org/gmt/am3/zoos/atlantEcoreZoo/ and I was no able to load a single one of them. Usually there are 2 packages in the .ecore file one containing the metamodel of the "Language"  (e.g. C, Java, C#) and the PrimitiveTypes. When I load the metamodel while creating new EMF project I always get an error from the "Language" package and only PrimitiveTypes are able to be loaded. 

The problem occurs in the "New EMF Project --> Package Selection" window and does not let to continue creating the project if the package "Language" is selected. When I try to select the "Language" package individually I get the error "An error  has occurred. See error log for more details". The error log generated is the following:


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2007-01-16 18:45:18.361
